reviews.review: This place was perfect for what I needed - a fully furnished apartment close to Western that offered roommate matching & has solid wifi. I'll be the first to admit that I didn't really take advantage of the test kitchen or play volleyball, but it was always an option. Nice to have a Fred Meyer and a bus stop right by, too.

ownerResponse.text: Sonja, thank you so much for your review.  We love our prime location, amenities and multiple transportation options to campus as well. We are sorry to see you leave NXNW, but thank you for being a resident with us while you were a student at WWU!

reviews.author: Simone Sawyer
reviews.review: Was a fine experience. But they tried to charge me over $300 to fix a carpet in my room that was damaged before I moved in and I contacted the person who lived in the room after me and they didnt even bother to fix the carpet.

ownerResponse.text: Simone, thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with Lark Bellingham. We are very sorry to hear of the issues you experienced related to carpet replacement and have attempted to reach out to you to discuss your individual  More

reviews.author: Kate Welch
reviews.review: Be forewarned, they utilize extremely predatory leasing practices and their staff is completely unhelpful in every way. I signed a lease here and attempted to cancel it before move-in and was given the runaround from the staff, who seem to

reviews.author: Benjamin Follett
reviews.review: There are small caveats that I have with NXNW. The gym is a bit small, the maintenance requests took way longer than the ETA, the shuttle still isn't ready, and rent is expensive. All that aside though, this place is very nice and you really get what you pay for.

reviews.review: The 5 star reviews are fake from Asset Plus Company employees. By far the worst apartment management I have ever dealt with. Severely overpriced, false advertising, aggressive/insecure leasing manager Aaron making threats when tenants speak

ownerResponse.text: Natalie, we appreciate your feedback, but we want to make sure that your experience while living at NXNW is an enjoyable one. It is important to us that our residents know that the management office is a resource for them, and we are here  More

reviews.author: Paige Carey
reviews.review: I haven't moved in yet, but I am way beyond excited to. As a transfer student I feel like I missed out on making friends since I didn't get to experience the "dorm life". But NXNW gives me that chance to have that experience and be

reviews.author: Holly Hobby
reviews.review: Always take photos when you move in or out. These people will charge you a fee if theres a fly in the apartment. They will also take their damages that were there already from the previous tenant and charge you. Beware.

ownerResponse.text: Holly, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with Lark Bellingham. Because it is always our number one priority to provide or residents with the best places to live while maintaining fair and consistent policies, we would  More

reviews.author: Annabel Jordan
reviews.review: I like having my own bathroom and I do think the price is worth it, the 24/7 gym is also a plus. I wish there was more parking but overall a good place to live

ownerResponse.text: Hi Annabel, thank you for your review. We are glad to see that you are enjoying living at Lark, thanks for being a part of our Lark family!

reviews.author: Thnh L
reviews.review: This apartment has modern decoration, during this pandemic time staff are so nice and helpful. My roommates are the best roommates I ever had, they are so nice. The best way to enjoy college life.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Ken,

Thank you for your response. We love seeing you tag us on social media and are glad you are having a nice time here.

reviews.review: My daughter has had nothing but bad things to say about her experience here. This place dresses up the common areas to sell it to parents but it is an unmanaged, dangerous complex.

reviews.review: Nice new place.  600 parking spots needed. 400 parking spots provided.  You do the math every evening trying to park, and parking blocks away in unsecured areas. NEEDS PARKING

reviews.author: Steven Stiles
reviews.review: Parking here is garbage. Paying $30 extra monthly for parking does not guarantee you a spot. However the complex is fairly nice and new and the amenities are useful. The staff is usually friendly and willing to help.

ownerResponse.text: Steven, we are sorry to hear that your experience with our reserved parking has not gone as expected.  The additional $30 is for the reserved parking, and we encourage our residents to call the office if someone is parked in your spot.  We  More

reviews.author: Ali Nazy
reviews.review: I have enjoyed my time living at Lark Bellingham and I am looking forward to another year of living here! The staff is very accommodating and friendly. They make sure any issues that come up are taken care of quickly and efficiently! I would recommend living here!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Ali, thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We enjoy having you as a resident with us. We can't wait to start the new term. Please reach out if you ever need anything.

reviews.author: James Mitchell
reviews.review: DO NOT PAY FOR PARKING. They will charge you money for reserved parking and do absolutely nothing about people who don't pay for parking taking up the reserved spots. They do nothing about issues and just play games with you over email. The management at this complex is absolutely awful.

ownerResponse.text: James, our Resident Services Manager has attempted to reach out to you about the proper procedure for reporting an improperly parked vehicle since due to Washington State laws we cannot patrol the parking lot. We have also attempted to  More

reviews.author: Mark MacDonald
reviews.review: Great place to work and live with helpful and supportive staff members. There's a large community vibe thanks to the volleyball courts, BBQ's, fire pits and ping pong tables available to all residents in the courtyard. Love being a part of the team and NXNW community.

reviews.author: Kaylie Kummer
reviews.review: I love it here!  The staff are all so friendly, and the main areas are really nice.  My apartment is perfect, and I have not had any problems with anything!

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Kaylie,

Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad to hear that you are enjoying living here! Don't hesitate to reach out if you ever need anything.

reviews.review: I have lived here half a year. Loved it already and have renewed as well as upgraded for next year. Verry pretty, has alot of little services that are very useful. Large rooms

ownerResponse.text: Hi Athena, Thank you so much for your feedback. We have recently been able to add cardboard recycling back to our property and hope that the trash overflows less now. We are glad to hear you are having a nice time here!

reviews.review: Been living here for a year. No problems so far. Office is always ready to help you with any kind of problems and the maintenance is super fast here

reviews.author: Cindy Howard
reviews.review: Nice place but be prepared to pay rent for 2 weeks that you can't even live there and the false advertising on their website about "plenty of onsite parking options".
